/* David Lee Roth era (1972–1985) */ Alex actually started out on the guitar only to switch places with Eddie
/* David Lee Roth era (1972–1985) */ The two brothers Eddie and Alex's roles were mixed up; Eddie is on Guitar, Alex is on Drums
/* Influence on culture, music, and business */
/* Current members */ Roth was never actually a member of Van Halen in 2000-2001, despite "jamming" with the band.
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/85.90.148.140|85.90.148.140]] ([[User talk:85.90.148.140|talk]]) to last version by Doctor396
/* Reunion with Roth (2006 - present) - Updates March 3, 2008 */
This was/is a non-issue. The postponed dates were rescheduled and the tour goes on. No special mention was made of the previously postponed St. Louis date (in 2007), no need to mention these either.
